resourceTemplates.name: search-photos
resourceTemplates.title: Search photos
resourceTemplates.description: Searches Unsplash for photos matching the given query. Supports filtering by color, orientation, collections, and content safety, with pagination and language options. Valid color values are: black_and_white, black, white, yellow, orange, red, purple, magenta, green, teal, and blue. Valid order_by values are latest and relevant. Valid orientation values: landscape, portrait, squarish

resourceTemplates.name: search-collections
resourceTemplates.title: Search collections
resourceTemplates.description: Searches Unsplash for collections matching the given query. Returns a single page of results with pagination options.

resourceTemplates.name: search-users
resourceTemplates.title: Search users
resourceTemplates.description: Searches Unsplash for users matching the given query. Returns a single page of results with pagination options.
